JAEYOON SONG  송재윤  宋才潤

I am an undergraduate student majoring in Business Administration and Information Science at Seoul National University. I also minor in Computer Science and Engineering.

My research area is Computer-Supported Cooperative Work (CSCW) and Social Computing, which are subfields of Human-Computer Interaction (HCI). I am interested in understanding how new technologies change work and organizations, and building interactive systems that support interaction at scale. My most recent project is about how to intrinsically motivate the crowd workers by personalizing the sequence of tasks.

Education

 Seoul National University Mar 2016 - Present
-  B.A.A. in Business Administration
-  B.S. in Information Science and Culture
-  Minor in Computer Science and Engineering

Research Experience

 KAIST Interaction Lab (Kixlab), KAIST Dec 2018 - Feb 2019, Jun 2019 - Present
-  Advised by Juho Kim

 Human-Computer Interaction Lab, Seoul National University Jun 2018 - Aug 2018
-  Advised by Jinwook Seo

Random Fact

Jaeyoon likes Cho-dang tofu !
